title: 24: Is This the New GameStop?
itunes:title: Is This the New GameStop?
description:
This week Ben and Emil tackle sanctions on Russian oligarchs, Amazon’s huge stock split, and whether Bed Bath & Beyond is another GameStop craze waiting to happen!
